message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product for a limited time at the price of $150.  I believe it will be very beneficial to you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $90 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer.  I understand your position, but I can't go as low as $90. How about we meet in the middle at $120?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $120 is still above my budget.  I'm willing to pay $105. This is my final offer.
